Detailed Description

Configuration of device. Object of this type is used for probe and init functions when checking memory requirements of device object and for hardware controller configuration. Size of device object in bytes is returned on probe function call in CUSBD_SysReq.privDataSize field. Remember that privDataSize returns size of device object only - it doesn't endpoints vector object size. It means that whole memory requirements = device size + (number of endpoints x single endpoint size)

Field Documentation

uintptr_t CUSBD_Config_s::didRegPtr

Pointer to DID register

CUSBD_DMAInterfaceWidth CUSBD_Config_s::dmaInterfaceWidth

DMA interface width, available values: DMA_32_WIDTH, DMA_64_WIDTH

uint32_t CUSBD_Config_s::dmultEnabled

hardware feature enabling DMA operation in DMULT mode 1 - enabled, 0 disabled For Device V1: A non-zero value of dmultEnabled enables DMULT mode for all channels For Device V3: Bits[15:0]: Control DMULT enable for EP-Out[15:0] Bits[31:16]: Control DMULT enable for EP-In[15:0]

CUSBD_EpConfig CUSBD_Config_s::epIN[CUSBD_NUM_EP_IN]

table of endpoint configuration objects for IN direction

CUSBDMA_MemResources(* CUSBD_Config_s::epMemRes)[32]

Keeps addresses of resources of all endpoints

CUSBD_EpConfig CUSBD_Config_s::epOUT[CUSBD_NUM_EP_OUT]

table of endpoint configuration objects for OUT direction

CUSBD_EpAuxBufferConfig CUSBD_Config_s::epOutAuxBufferCfg[CUSBD_NUM_EP_OUT]

array of endpoint aux buffer configuration objects for OUT direction

uint8_t CUSBD_Config_s::extendedTBCMode

Extended TBC enable mode if ETC enabled (0: ETE always disabled, 1:ETE enabled for all speeds)

uint8_t CUSBD_Config_s::forcedUsbMode

Forced USB mode (0 - none (default), 2 - USB2/HS, 3 - USB3/SS, other - reserved)

uint32_t CUSBD_Config_s::preciseBurstLength

Set configurable burst length in DMA, available values: PRECISE_BURST_0, PRECISE_BURST_1, PRECISE_BURST_2, PRECISE_BURST_4, PRECISE_BURST_8, PRECISE_BURST_16, PRECISE_BURST_32, PRECISE_BURST_64, PRECISE_BURST_128

uintptr_t CUSBD_Config_s::regBase

base address of device controller registers

uintptr_t CUSBD_Config_s::ridRegPtr

Pointer to RID register

CH9_UsbSetup* CUSBD_Config_s::setupPacket

Pointer (virtual) to the setup packet

uintptr_t CUSBD_Config_s::setupPacketDma

Physical address of setup packet for DMA
